backup_funds.string: Now that you have some funds in your wallet, it is time to back up your money!

backup_funds_no.string: There are no funds in your wallet yet, but you can create a backup if you wish.

pass_text.string: You added a passphrase to your recovery phrase during wallet setup.

pass_never_share.string: <accent>Never share</accent> your passphrase with anyone as this may result in the loss of funds.

pass_confirm_text.string: Enter the passphrase you added while setting up and creating your wallet.

mnemonic_error_description.string: Bitkit could not read your recovery phrase.

mnemonic_write.string: Write down these {length} words in the right order and store them in a safe place.

mnemonic_use.string: Use the 12 words below to recover your money at a later date.

mnemonic_never_share.string: <accent>Never share</accent> your recovery phrase with anyone as this may result in the loss of funds.

mnemonic_confirm_tap.string: Tap the 12 words in the correct order.

mnemonic_result_text.string: Make sure you store your recovery phrase in a <accent>secure place</accent>, as this is the <accent>only way to recover</accent> your money!

mnemonic_keep_text.string: Remember, <accent>never share your recovery phrase</accent> with anyone! If you do, they can steal your money, profile and other data.

mnemonic_data_text.string: Your profile, contacts, accounts, tags, and activity will be backed up automatically to our free cloud service.

mnemonic_multiple_text.string: Don't use your Bitkit recovery phrase on multiple phones simultaneously, as this can corrupt your data.

pin_security_text.string: To increase wallet security, you can set up a PIN code and Face ID.

pin_choose_text.string: Please use a PIN you will remember. If you forget your PIN you can reset it, but that will require restoring your wallet.

pin_retype_text.string: Please retype your 4-digit PIN to complete the setup process.

pin_not_match.string: Try again, this is not the same PIN.

pin_disable_text.string: PIN code is currently enabled. If you want to disable your PIN, you need to enter your current PIN code first.

pin_last_attempt.string: Last attempt. Entering the wrong PIN again will reset your wallet.

pin_forgot_text.string: Forgot your PIN? Reset and recover your Bitkit wallet with your recovery phrase. Set a new PIN after completing recovery.

pin_send.string: Please enter your PIN code to confirm and send out this payment.

bio_no.string: It appears that your device does not support Biometric security.

bio_error_message.string: Bitkit could not set up {type} for your device.

bio_not_available.string: Looks like you havenâ€™t set up biometric security yet (or it is not supported). Try to enable it in your phone settings.

bio_ask.string: PIN code set. Would you like to use {biometricsName} instead of your PIN code?

success_bio.string: You have successfully set up a PIN code and {biometricsName} to improve wallet security.

success_no_bio.string: You have successfully set up a PIN code to improve your wallet security.

reset_text.string: Back up your wallet first to avoid loss of your funds and wallet data. Resetting will overwrite your current Bitkit setup.

reset_dialog_desc.string: Are you sure you want to reset your Bitkit Wallet? Do you have a backup of your recovery phrase and wallet data?

recovery_text.string: You've entered Bitkit's recovery mode. Here are some actions to perform when running into issues that prevent the app from fully functioning. Restart the app for a normal startup.

export_text.string: You can export a copy of your wallet data as a .ZIP file. This file is encrypted with the password you set below.

export_success_msg.string: Bitkit successfully exported the backup file to your phone.

export_error_msg.string: Bitkit could not export the backup file to your phone.

export_error_file.string: Bitkit could not create the backup file.

cp_text.string:
You can change your PIN code to a new
4-digit combination. Please enter your current PIN code first.

cp_retype_text.string: Please retype your 4-digit PIN to complete the setup process.

cp_setnew_text.string: Please use a PIN you will remember. If you forget your PIN you can reset it, but that will require restoring your wallet.

cp_try_again.string: Try again, this is not the same PIN.

cp_changed_text.string: You have successfully changed your PIN to a new 4-digit combination.

wiped_message.string: Bitkit has been reset and all wallet data has been deleted.

description.string: Make sure you trust this service before granting permission to manage your data.

pubky_auth_error_description.string: Unable to auth with Pubky service
